urlset:
{# home page #}
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }} daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr daily 0.8
{# Generate address for all static pages #}
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/contact daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/contact daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/tour daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/tour daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/terms daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/terms daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/privacy daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/privacy daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/blog daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/blog daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/login daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/login daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/signup/patient daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/signup/patient daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/en/signup/provider daily 0.8
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/fr/signup/provider daily 0.8
{# Generate address for all providers vanity URL #}
{% for provider in vanity_url_list %}
http://www.{{ domain_setup.domain_name }}/{{ provider.vanity_url }} daily 0.8
{# not yet 2005-01-01 #}
{% endfor %}
